comment: She really wants you to succeed.  I've never had a teacher that did everything she could to help you succeed, except take the test for you.

Professor Naidu was honestly a really interesting professor and it was an easy class for me. I personally liked the way she taught certain things, but there is a lot of homework/aleks. Her tests are straight forward and some are from aleks and she gives credit for worked out work. She is also super engaging !

She makes college algebra even easier than it is. She walks you through examples in class, and the ALEKS homework covers all the material that will be on tests. As long as you attend class, review notes, and do the homework, the tests will be straightforward. She's also very nice, funny, and genuinely cares to help you pass.
TAKE HER!!! she is a great teacher. Easy to understand her class if you pay attention, attend class, and DO ALEKS.

College Algebra itself is a very easy course but Professor Naidu goes over all the material well in a way you can understand it. There is weekly ALEKS but it is not long nor is it usually hard. There are 3 tests + the final and she will give you practice tests for all of them. Those practice tests are what she uses for the tests so use them!!

she was great! She has an English accent which makes the math really interesting. no quiz just three tests and final but if you master the practice test you'll be chillin. You have hw every week on ALEKS but its not terrible. I recommend you copy her written notes prior to class so you can just focus on what she says without copying her work.

She really wants you to pass her class. If you don't put your full effort in this class..... good luck. Def don't recommend skipping a single class (unless it's necessary) because she goes over so much material. However, she will check on everyone very often to make sure everyone is understanding the material. She's great.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Skip class? You won't pass.--Amazing lectures

comment: Professor Naidu has been amazing. She is very caring and genuinely wants to get to know each student and help them pass. Her exams were much more forgiving than my last Algebra professor, and she also gives partial credit, something a lot of KSU professors seem to not do. She also held study sessions outside of class. Can't recommend her enough!

Like some other comments have said the class is synchronized online and past lectures are available for viewing basically 24/7 which makes studying for exams and doing homework easier. Exams looked the same as study guides and homework assignments, and both are reviewed during lectures. Wonderful teacher but you have to work for your grade.

Synchronized online class but she records all lectures. Attendance is required. Practice tests help! No extra credit! Will do private tutor sessions! Homework through Aleks. Must work for grade. 3 tests (98,100,100) and final (92 pending half credit). Great teacher over all! 98 in class right now! Lockdown browser with webcam! Highly recommend!
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Clear grading criteria--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: If you like long boring lectures in a monotone voice then this is the class for you! You can't miss a single ALEKS assignment or you'll be struggling. The tests are way harder than the ALEKS assignments in my opinion. If you have to take her class online I don't recommend it! Also you must be very formal in your emails to her or shell get very mad.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Skip class? You won't pass.--Tough grader

comment: If you attend her lectures and utilize the tools given; you will pass and are very likely to get an A. She drops the lowest hw grade, provides practice tests that's just like the real ones, and will meet with you if you need help. She has met with me to help with HW, even though it was due that night. Very easy to reach and listens to feedback.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Dont take her if youre not already good at math. If you are the type of person to forget what you learned like a test or two ago dont take her. The site that she uses to teach continuously brings up past topics that you mightve already forgotten. It is heavily homework-based and sometime she doesnt even completely finish what shes teaching.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Lots of homework--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: If I could take her every semester I would. She takes her time with you and offers help after class as needed. She explains the problems to you from scratch until you comprehend it. You should attend every class. She is very clear with her grading scale. Not many test in her class nor pop quizzes. She is one of the best KSU has.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--Amazing lectures

comment: Dr. Naidu is very professional in her teaching method and she makes sure that students understands the material before moving on. Great teacher and I am glad to have taken her class.

She is honestly one of the best teachers I have ever met, she makes the classroom feel safe and relaxed and it didn't take long for all the students to relax and soon it didn't even feel like it was math class. I can't believe I'm saying this, but math was my favorite class and Prof. Naidu was why it turned out that way.  Take her class
Take her if you can, so sweet. Makes everything very clear, amazing math teacher.
Amazing professor. Crystal clear. No accent. I highly recommend her.

Your grade is mostly composed of four tests and a final. Explains everything clearly. Stays on topic. Always offers help. Sometimes she will make attendance optional. Tests are difficult, but not to hard if you attend class. Would definitely take another class. Her method of using the whiteboard makes note taking easy. You don't need the textbook.

Naidu is awesome! Gives definitions and examples equally. Does a great job explaining the process of finding the answers in easy to learn terminology. She is always there to answer questions. All the examples on the test are from the homework. Pay attention and come to class and you will do great.
Prof Naidu is so amazing! I love her! She is a fantastic teacher, and helps in so many ways. She gives lots of online homework, but it pays off in the end. Made a 100 on the final. Take her!!!!

She is the best teacher I've ever had. Not just the best math teacher but period. To this day I still visit her office and we talk and she gives help for the classes I'm in now. I love this woman!! She's easy, thorough, and babys you. Take her like forreal!!

Professor Naidu is one of the funnest professors I've had so far.  She explains everything in a way you can understand it easily.  There are 4 tests and a compass review for those that need it.  Take her if you want to do well in math.
Love her!  If you have a hard time with math she makes it easy to understand.  I highly recommend her!

Such a sweet lady! She has the cutest english accent. Her lectures are boring, but nonetheless helpful. Lots of online homework but it definitely helps. If you do the online practice tests 3-4x, I PROMISE you will pass the tests. The tests are just like the online practice tests. Definitely try to get this professor! Made math manageable.
She is a wonderful teacher I  was awful in math and now am a A student in math she wants you to succeed !! I love her take her if possible!
Wonderful math teacher.  For someone who dreads Math, she made me understand the material and enjoy the class.  Awesome professor.
Awesome teacher. Made me really understand math again. Wished she taught 1111 or 1101. Would love to have her as a teacher again!

Awesome teacher!!! Seriously, she makes math so easy I would be surprised if you could not get an A. She is so helpful and knows the material extremely well. LOVED her!!! Taking her for 0098 and trying to convince her to teach a higher level class.

i totally suck at math. in high school i dreaded the class. i made all A's in her class, and understood what i was doing for the first time in my life! best teacher ever for math. wish i could have her for every math class.
